QuestData.Title: Sharks in the Water
QuestData.Description: Recently a large gam of sharks has moved into the shallower water in the harbor. I have dealt with minor illnesses before that were caused by creatures carrying foreign contaminants to shore.$b$bPerhaps the sharks have brought something in from the deeper waters? Cull some of the sharks that have wandered too close to the pier. I shall read the tides for any changes.
QuestData.CompletionText: The sea's creatures travel where they may find food, but they carry danger with them.
QuestData.RewardText: Unfortunate... the tides still speak the same.
